text: Are there any server logs? Huge problem on the website right now where it returns 0 posts, but in the editor all posts are there. Logging the hublData and its returning 0 post in production

Thought maybe there is an error inside the hubl function, but I am trying to return the raw content straight from HS, and it’s not returning this as well. It’s a huge issue since it’s a job site and now no jobs are displayed

On first visit after deploying it will return all the posts. When someone else visits the page it will just return an empty array from the server like if there is no post found. Tried it out by logging the data inside an island and inside the DOM rendered from the server, both will say the array is empty. Feel like there is an issue on the server right now
Greetings! Curious if CMS react modules that pull data from objects (like Product) would count against API limits?
